name: Chicken Adobo
description: A classic Filipino dish braised in vinegar, soy sauce, and garlic.

name: Bicol Express
description: Bicol Express is a rich and spicy Filipino dish made with pork, coconut milk, shrimp paste, and chili peppers for a bold, savory kick.
